com.sun.enterprise.v3.admin

Class CheckpointHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.enterprise.v3.admin.CheckpointHelper

  • @Service
public class CheckpointHelper
extends Object
    This class is starting point for persistent CheckpointHelper, and currently only persists and restores AdminCommandContext with payloads in separate files.
    Author:
    Andriy Zhdanov
